title: Java Enterprise Edition 8 for Beginners course
highlight: Understand Jakarta EE, JPA, CDI, JAX-RS, REST, JWT, JSON-P and JSON-B
requirement: Basic knowledge in Java programming, Enthusiasm and a willingness to take your Java skills to the next level
lerningObjective: Understand the theoretical underpinnings of Java Enterprise Edition (JEE),Learn to create applications using JEE!
